phrases: Episode 5 No Way I would Regret It
Episode 5 No Way I would Regret It
Episode 5 No Way I would Regret It
Episode 5 No Way I would Regret It
Yupon (nitroplus)
Episode 6
This is very strange
Can you really grant any wish?
Do not worry.
I can grant your wish, no problem.
So, is that what you really want?
Yes, do it.
That is it.
Take it.
This is your destiny.
Oh, no!
Pardon me.
What is wrong, Hitomi?
Did not sleep?
The police kept me at the hospital late last night.
What?!
Did something happen?
It seems as though I was sleep-walking or something.
There were some other girls there, but they were all out cold when I woke up.
No way!
The doctor said it could have been a collective hallucination.
He wants me to come back in for more testing after school.
It is such a bother.
Why did not you just stay home today, then?
I cannot do that!
People would think that I am really sick, and my family would be worried.
That is our honor student!
You are so mature!
I have not felt this good in ages!
This is great!
Say, Sayaka-chan.
Are not you scared?
Hmm?
Well, of course I am a little scared.
But that went pretty well yesterday.
If I had to say it, I am more afraid of losing you and Hitomi.
You two are my best friends, after all.
That is why!
How should I put it?
Confident?
Clear-minded?
It is like I can trust myself.
Whatever the case, I feel great!
Mitakihara will now be under the protection of the great Magical Girl Sayaka-chan!
You do not regret it at all?
Well...
If I were to regret anything,
it would be that I hesitated.
I wonder how things would be if I had chosen sooner.
If we had both fought at that time, Mami-san may have lived.
You need to stop thinking like that.
I know...
I am just saying this because you cannot change the past.
I cannot really explain it even if I try.
I just wanted to become a Magical Girl.
Sayaka-chan...
I found my wish.
It is something that I am willing to risk my life for.
It is my fault for not realizing it until now.
So you should not feel bad.
It just means that you do not have to become a Magical Girl.
Well, I have got to get going.
Huh?
You have plans?
Something like that.
I see.
So you cannot leave yet.
I still have some therapy.
They will not let me leave until I can walk again.
As for my hand, they have no idea why it suddenly got better.
They would like to keep it under observation for a little longer.
How are you feeling?
Are you still in any pain?
None at all.
That is what surprises me the most.
It is like the accident was just a bad dream.
I do not even know what I am doing in this bed.
It is like you said.
This is a miracle, is not it?
What is wrong?
I said some pretty horrible things to you, Sayaka-chan.
I am not sure what got into me.
There is no need to remember things like that.
All that matters is that you are happy now.
Do not make such a sad face.
Yeah.
I felt like I was running out of time.
Well, do not overdo it.
Oh, look at the time.
Kyousuke, why do not we get some fresh air?
What is on the roof?
You will see.
Everyone is here!
The real celebration does not come until you are officially discharged,
but we decided to do something to celebrate your recovery first.
Th-That is...
You asked me to get rid of it, but I just could not.
Go on.
There is nothing to be scared of.
Mami,
my wish has finally come true.
How could I regret it?
I have never been this happy.
Hmm...
So that is the new Magical Girl in town.
Are you really intending on fighting her?
She is obviously a pushover.
I would finish her off in an instant.
Who cares?
You got a problem with that?
It may not be as easy as you think.
After all, she is not the only other Magical Girl here.
Huh?
And who would that be?
I am not sure.
What?
Did not she make a contract with you to become a Magical Girl?
You could say that she both did and did not.
She is a peculiar one.
Even I do not know what she will do.
This makes things more interesting.
I was worried that I was going to get bored.
Maybe it will even be fun.
What did you want to talk about?
Well, it is about Sayaka-chan...
She is stubborn, she gets nervous easily, and she is always getting into fights.
But she is a good girl.
She is kind, bold, and she always tries her best to help others.
As a Magical Girl, that is a fatal flaw.
Is that... so...?
Kindness begets naivety.
Courage begets imprudence.
There is no reward for devotion.
Those who cannot understand that are not fit to be Magical Girls.
That is why Tomoe Mami lost her life.
Do not say that!
Sayaka-chan says that she is fine...
You are worried about Miki Sayaka, are not you?
There is nothing I can do for her, so...
So please, Homura-chan...
Be friends with Sayaka-chan and do not fight with her, like how things were with you and Mami.
It will be much safer if you go after the Witches together rather than going alone.
I do not want to make any false promises.
I suggest you give up on Miki Sayaka.
Why?
She did not have to make a contract.
That was my mistake.
I should have protected her, as I had you.
So...
I will accept the responsibility, as this is an irreversible mistake.
Similar to the way one cannot be brought back from the dead,
there is no saving someone once they have become a Magical Girl.
Making the contract means giving up everything you have for that one wish.
So you have given up...
Yes.
I will not ask for your forgiveness.
Regardless how heavy my sins may be, I must continue to fight.
It looks like I have wasted your time.
Sorry.
Are you nervous?
Naturally.
One mistake and it is game over.
Madoka?
Sayaka-chan, are you...
Yep!
I am going out on patrol in search of Witches.
It is my duty as an ally of justice!
Are you okay going alone?
Of course.
That is how Mami-san did it.
I am her student too, you know.
Uhm...
I will not be of much help, and I would probably just get in the way...
Are not you trying too hard?
I am... sorry...
You are right.
I would definitely just get in the way.
Not at all.
It would make me really happy.
My hands have not stopped shaking for a while now.
Can you tell?
It is kind of lame as a Magical Girl, but I feel lonely going on my own.
Sayaka-chan...
You will not be a nuisance.
I am really happy you want to come.
I feel calmer when I have got someone with me, like I can do anything!
I will protect you!
Come on, you will be fine.
Let us hunt Witches like we did before.
You understand the dangers, right?
I know I am clumsy so I am bound to make mistakes on my own.
But if Madoka's with me, I will be more careful.
I see.
It is fine as long as you understand.
Kyubei...
You have your reasons too, Madoka.
I know you want to protect Sayaka-chan.
As long as you are there to support Sayaka, there is no limit to what you can do.
You do not need to say anything.
I am sure Sayaka-chan would agree.
If you make the decision, I will be ready to grant your wish anytime.
Here it is.
This barrier must have been set up by a familiar instead of a Witch.
Do not get cocky.
You are still new at this.
Do not be sloppy.
I got it.
That is...
It is getting away!
I got this!
Wait up.
What do you two think you are doing?
It is getting away!
Cannot you tell by looking?
That was not a Witch, only a familiar.
They do not even carry grief seeds.
But if we do not do something about it, someone could be killed!
You should just wait for it to kill someone so that it will become a Witch.
Then you can get grief seeds from it.
What do you think will happen to your chicken if you break the egg?
Are you saying we should just stand around while it kills people?
You sure are weird.
Did not you know?
They should have taught you all about the food chain in school.
The Witches eat weak humans, and we eat them.
It is nature's law.
This is how we separate the weak from the strong.
Do not...
You...
Do not tell me you believe in helping people and justice.
Is that the real reason you made that contract with this little guy?
Say whatever you want!
Why do not you just give up?
Joining us for some half-assed reason...
You are pissing me off.
Sayaka-chan!
Hmph.
Why do not you cool your head a bit?
That is strange.
That attack should have had you out of commission for three months.
Sayaka-chan, are you okay?
Because she became a Magical Girl by wishing for someone is health...
Who the hell would listen to you?
If it were not for people like you, Mami-san would not...
You are annoying.
Very annoying!
What is your problem?
You should not talk to your seniors like that.
Shut up!
Who do you think you are talking to?!
Sayaka-chan!
Madoka, stay back!
It is dangerous!
You are a fool who understands neither words nor beatings.
Looks like I have no choice but to kill you!
I cannot lose.
Like hell I would lose!
Why?
Hey, why is this happening?
Why do we have to fight each other even when there are no Witches?
There is nothing I can do.
Neither of them will back down.
Kyubei, please make them stop.
This is not right!
There is nothing I can do, but...
If you want them to stop, there is a way.
Only another Magical Girl can interfere.
You have the ability to choose that if that is what you wish for.
That is right.
If I make a contract...
This is the end.
That will not be necessary.
Sayaka-chan, you became a Magical Girl to go after Witches, did not you?
She is not a Witch, she is a Magical Girl like you...
This is very strange.
